name: Bump Soccer.io – Balls Star 3D
description:
You liked Soccer.io? You'll love Soccer.io
The rule of this io game is very easy,
just Knock balls into other player goals!

FEATURES of this io game:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Simple rules but a little difficult to Goal
*Relax and enjoy
You'll surely love this io game once you get how it works!
